<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/history/{address}"}

>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Get APR history statistics for a specific validator

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

  parameters={[{"name":"address","in":"path","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"},"description":"The validator address."}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"Successfully retrieved APR history by validator address.","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"object","properties":{"top5CoreApr":{"type":"string","description":"The top 5 core APR."},"top5BtcApr":{"type":"string","description":"The top 5 BTC APR."},"coreMaxApr":{"type":"number","description":"The core max APR."},"btcMaxApr":{"type":"number","description":"The BTC max APR."},"btcMinApr":{"type":"string","description":"The BTC min APR."},"coreMinApr":{"type":"string","description":"The core min APR."}}}}}}},"400":{"description":"Bad request - invalid API key"}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
